text:
@politico Angela Merkel has a doctorate in quantum chemistry. 

Leo Varadkar (Prime Minister of Ireland) is an actual Doctor who is now going to work on the frontlines to fight Coronavirus

Trump has filed bankruptcy 
4 times, cheated on 2 wives, lied to Americans over 18,000 times
